Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Hor son of Ruru with a lappet-wig, a modelled face, parallel hands in relief holding an incised hoe, adze and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
